body: Thanks.  Unfortunately the traceback you showed just tells me that the program is waiting for another program to exit.  The other program is `testprogcgo.exe CgoExternalThreadSignal crash`.  We need to figure out why that program is not exiting.  If it is ignoring `^\`, can you try something else?  Try killing the process from a different terminal, such as `kill -ILL <pid>`.  Or try attaching to it from a debugger and getting a stack trace.  Or try running the program under `dtruss -f`.  Any of those might help figure out what it is doing.  Thanks.
